title: How to calculate the BSR of any best selling books on Amazon kdp

tactics.name: paraphrase_content
tactics.description: Rephrase content from modeled books to avoid plagiarism
steps: Research non-fiction books in target category
Use Google to gather details on book topics
Paraphrase content using tools like Power Facing Soup
Check for plagiarism with plagiarism detection tools
source_quotes: you should not copy word for word from the book you are modeling

tactics.name: format_book_properly
tactics.description: Ensure book formatting meets Amazon requirements
steps: Create title page with larger font size
Start each chapter on a new paragraph
caveats: Poor formatting may result in rejected uploads
source_quotes: your work doesn't look modded up when your publishing is on amazon

tactics.name: manual_page_count_adjustment
tactics.description: Adjust book page count by increasing font size to meet minimum page requirements for KDP paperback
steps: Check copyright page and table of contents
Increase font size to reach desired page count
caveats: When font size adjustments fail to meet page requirements
source_quotes: if it is paperback ensure it is up to 24 pages if it is not up to 24 pages the only thing you can do to increase the size is to increase the font

heuristics.name: boost_low_review_books
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, boost visibility
source_quotes: you should have gotten your keywords that you're going to use

heuristics.name: review_count_threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting review count
source_quotes: if you increase the fund you can increase this point if you increase the funds if we it will get to the number of pages you desire

claims.statement: Using a copyright template helps claim ownership of content
source_quotes: the only thing you need to do is copy from the template

claims.statement: KDP requires paperbacks to have at least 24 pages, achievable by increasing font size
source_quotes: if it is paperback ensure it is up to 24 pages if it is not up to 24 pages the only thing you can do to increase the size is to increase the font

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (teen boys), problem (ADHD), and constraint (Christian values) for niche appeal
source_quotes: you should have gotten an idea of the title of the book you want to um model
